description: This file sets up and runs an accuracy evaluation for a calculator agent using OpenAI models, including defining the evaluation parameters and executing it.

classes.name: AccuracyEval
classes.description: Class representing an accuracy evaluation for a specific task.

classes.description: Class representing the result of an accuracy evaluation.

classes.description: Class representing an OpenAI chat model.

classes.description: Class providing calculator tools for the agent.
